sentences.en: Cano is delighted with the burgeoning success of Fossil Fuels ale.
sentences.cn: 看到“化石酿造”麦芽酒迅速成长,卡诺倍感欣慰.

sentences.en: China's burgeoning economy has Beijing and brimming with commercial chaos.
sentences.cn: 中国经济的迅速发展,让北京的商业“大杂烩”呈现出生机勃勃、欣欣向荣的景象.

sentences.en: Dense silver light metal columns and washing pool portfolio burgeoning clear.
sentences.cn: 闪着银色光芒的金属立柱与盥洗池组合,冷冽清澈.

sentences.en: It is a burgeoning technology of using Java to tap WebGIS application.
sentences.cn: Java开发WebGIS应用是一门新兴的技术.

sentences.en: Most of this growth attributed to the burgeoning China market.
sentences.cn: 最大的成长来源是归因于发展快速的中国市场.

sentences.en: Our company's business is burgeoning now.
sentences.cn: 我们公司的业务现在发展很迅速.

sentences.en: Pediatric emergency medicine is a burgeoning subject.
sentences.cn: 小儿急诊医学是一门新兴学科.

sentences.en: Portman is particularly satisfied with the burgeoning romance her character experiences.
sentences.cn: 波曼对她的角色正在经历的浪漫爱情感到格外满意.

sentences.en: That growth is evident in Beyonce's burgeoning acting career.
sentences.cn: 这种成长在碧昂丝蒸蒸日上的表演生涯中是显而易见的.

sentences.en: The ant algorithm is one kind of burgeoning optimization algorithm.
sentences.cn: 蚁群算法是一种新兴的启发优化算法.

sentences.en: The network shops this kind of burgeoning channel, have clear advantage.
sentences.cn: 网络购物这种新兴的渠道, 具备明显的优势.

sentences.en: The state had no choice but to accept the reality of burgeoning farmers’ markets and private trade.
sentences.cn: 国家别无他法，唯有接受增长迅速的农民市场与私营交易这个现实。

sentences.en: There is a burgeoning group of young architects newly interested in ornament and decoration, but their version is highly digitized and futuristic.
sentences.cn: 有一群对装饰和点缀很感兴的年轻建筑师的迅速成长，但是他们是那种数字化和未来派的。

sentences.en: These efforts were insufficient to contain the burgeoning crisis.
sentences.cn: 这些努力不足以抑制迅速扩散的危机。

sentences.en: This loophole has allowed the burgeoning trade to develop.
sentences.cn: 这个漏洞使得象牙贸易越做越大.

sentences.en: This thirst for information online is stoking a burgeoning knowledge economy.
sentences.cn: 对网上信息的渴望是给迅速发展的知识经济增加燃料.

sentences.en: To burgeoning speech, data network market, intel also gave very great attention.
sentences.cn: 对于新兴的语音, 数据网络市场, 英特尔也给予了很大的关注.

words.tran_cn: 增长迅速的；生机勃勃的

trans.tran_cn: 迅速成长的，迅速发展的
发芽，抽枝( burgeon的现在分词 )，迅速发展，发（芽），抽（枝）
